mapper.insert: insert into t_folder (sid, userId, name, isLock, sort, deleteState, createTime, modifyTime, count) values (#{sid}, #{userId}, #{name}, #{isLock}, #{sort}, #{deleteState}, #{createTime}, #{modifyTime}, #{count}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE name=values(name), isLock=values(isLock), sort=values(sort), deleteState=values(deleteState), modifyTime=values(modifyTime)
mapper.select: select userId, name, deleteState, count from t_folder where sid = #{sid}
